entry.title: No, It really isn’t Real Radio

link.title: No, It really isn't Real Radio

entry.content: There may or may not be an article which puts my view on so called “network radio” here some time in the future.
entry.summary: There may or may not be an article which puts my view on so called “network radio” here some time in the future.

entry.title: Welcome to Radio-Noise
entry.content:
Welcome to Radio-Noise.net

Initially, this website was intented to be a pseudo-business website. Looks like a business website, must be a business website. Well, Mircrosoft thought it was at least.

Anyway, I have now decided that I will use it as a general blog. I might occasionally write posts, probably complaints about something I have seen, and as much as I’d love to talk about politics, I won’t be doing that.
entry.summary: Welcome to Radio-Noise.net Initially, this website was intented to be a pseudo-business website. Looks like a business website, must be a business website. Well, Mircrosoft thought it was at least. Anyway, I have now decided that I will use it as a general blog. I might occasionally write posts, probably complaints about something I have seen, and as much as I’d love to talk about politics, I won’t be doing that.
